longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Holders of an APEC Business Travel
Card (ABTC) provided endorsed  Valid for travel
to TWN":
 - for a max. stay of 90 days.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of an ROC (Taiwan) Business and Academic Travel Card, issued
by Chinese Taipei. 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Permanent residents of Hong Kong
(SAR China) BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR China)
can obtain "Entry Permit" on arrival, for a max. stay of 30
days, provided  
Visa required, except for Permanent residents of Hong Kong
(SAR China) NOT BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR
China), who have made previous visits to Chinese Taipei, can
obtain an "Entry permit" on arrival for a max. stay of 30
days, provided  
Minors:
- For children (up to/incl. 19 years) traveling
  
Additional Information:
- A valid visa in an expired passport
  
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination.
- Former nationals of China (People's Rep.)
   
- Permanent residents of Hong Kong (SAR China) and Macao (SAR
  China) NOT BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR
  China), who have obtained an Online Entry Permit
  
- Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China), Macao (SAR China) or
  British National (Overseas) passports, who also hold a
  passport issued by another country,
  
Warning:
- Passport number and nationality must match those stated on
  the APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC).
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
